title: IMI
instructions: A number of statements which people have used to describe the game are given below. Read each statement and indicate your agreement with that statement. There are no right or wrong answers. Do not spend too much time on any one statement. Remember, give the answer which seems to describe how you thought during the game.

q_text.text: I enjoyed this game very much.
I would describe this game as very interesting.
While watching the game, I was thinking about how much I enjoyed it.
This game did not hold my attention.
